Package zork

Class BeachActionsTest

java.lang.Object
zork.BeachActionsTest
public class BeachActionsTest extends Object
Class to test beach-specific methods to enable ways or manipulate things in other ways
Version:
01.09.21
Author:
Yvonne Rahnfeld

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    testFeedCrocodile_WithFishEasternBeach_WaysRemainBlockedBushAndCrocodileDoNotMove()
    Assert that when crocodile gets fed with fish (not its necessary item), this direction of both ways (beach to jungle) blocked, the other direction remains free, crocodile and thorny bush do not move
    void
    testFeedCrocodile_WithMeatEasternBeach_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile()
    Assert that when crocodile gets fed with meat (its necessary item), this direction of both ways (jungle to beach) is free, it moves to the other beach/jungle connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with thorny bush
    void
    testFeedCrocodile_WithMeatPalmForest_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile()
    Assert that when crocodile gets fed with meat (its necessary item), this direction of both ways (beach to jungle) is free, it moves to the other jungle/beach connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with thorny bush
    void
    testFeedShark_FeedWithFishEasternBeach_SharkMovesToIslandWayIsFree()
    Assert shark leaves room (eastern beach) after feeding with fish (necessary item) and moves to island, way to island is free, way from island is blocked, fish left inventory
    void
    testFeedShark_FeedWithFishIsland_SharkMovesToEasternBeachWayIsFree()
    Assert shark leaves room (island) after feeding with fish (necessary item) and moves to eastern beach, way to eastern beach is free, way from eastern beach is blocked, fish left inventory
    void
    testFeedShark_FeedWithMeatEasternBeach_SharkDoesNotMoveToIslandWayRemainsFree()
    Assert shark does not leave room (eastern beach) after feeding with meat (is not the sharks necessary item) and does not move to island, way to island remains blocked, way from island remains free, meat left inventory
    void
    testUseFishingRodWithFishSwarm_Island_ReceiveFishKeepRodFishSwarmStillInRoom()
    Assert item fish is added to room if fishing rod is in players inventory and nonitem fish swarm exists in current room (island), fish swarm stays in room
    void
    testUseFishingRodWithFishSwarm_MiddleBeach_ReceiveFishKeepRodFishSwarmStillInRoom()
    Assert item fish is added to room if fishing rod is in players inventory and nonitem fish swarm exists in current room (middle beach), fish swarm stays in room
    void
    testUseMacheteWithThornyBush_JungleGlade_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile()
    Assert the thorny bush gets cut down, this direction of both ways (jungle to beach) is free, thorny bush moves to the other beach/jungle connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with the crocodile
    void
    testUseMacheteWithThornyBush_WesternBeach_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile()
    Assert the thorny bush gets cut down, this direction of both ways (beach to jungle) is free, thorny bush moves to the other jungle/beach connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with the crocodile
    void
    testUseNoteWithSuitcase_NoteInInventory_AllContainedItemsGetAddedToRoom()
    Assert that when item note is in inventory and gets used with nonItem suitcase, the suitcase gets opened and releases all of its items
    void
    testUseNoteWithSuitcase_NoteNotInInventory_SuitcaseStillClosedNoItemsAddedToRoom()
    Assert that when item note is not in inventory and player tries to use it with nonItem suitcase, the suitcase does not get opened and releases no items
    void
    testUseRucksack_RucksackInInventory_InventorySizeIncreasedRucksackRemovedFromInventory()
    Assert that when rucksack is in players inventory and gets used, the inventories max size gets increased by the rucksacks strength-attribute and rucksack gets removed from inventory
    void
    testUseRucksack_RucksackInRoom_InventorySizeIncreasedRucksackRemovedFromRoom()
    Assert that when rucksack is in current room and gets used, the inventories max size gets increased by the rucksacks strength-attribute and rucksack leaves current room
    void
    testUseRucksack_RucksackNotInInventoryOrRoom_InventorySizeNotIncreased()
    Assert that when player tries to use rucksack when it's not in inventory or current room, the inventories max size does not get increased by the rucksacks strength-attribute
    void
    testUseSpearWithCoconutPalm_PlayerHasNoSpear_CoconutNotAddedToRoom()
    Assert that when item spear is not in players inventory it can't be used with NonItem coconut palm, item coconut will not be added to current room
    void
    testUseSpearWithCoconutPalm_PlayerHasSpear_CoconutAddedToRoomEveryThirdTry()
    Assert that when item spear is in players inventory and is thrown at the NonItem coconut palm the item coconut will be added to current room only every third try

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • testUseFishingRodWithFishSwarm_Island_ReceiveFishKeepRodFishSwarmStillInRoom

      @Test @DisplayName("UseFishingRodWithFishSwarm \u00e2\u2020\u2019 item fish added to room(island), fish swarm still in room, fishing rod still in inventory") public void testUseFishingRodWithFishSwarm_Island_ReceiveFishKeepRodFishSwarmStillInRoom()
      Assert item fish is added to room if fishing rod is in players inventory and nonitem fish swarm exists in current room (island), fish swarm stays in room

    • testUseFishingRodWithFishSwarm_MiddleBeach_ReceiveFishKeepRodFishSwarmStillInRoom

      @Test @DisplayName("UseFishingRodWithFishSwarm \u00e2\u2020\u2019 item fish added to room(middle beach), fish swarm still in room, fishing rod still in inventory") public void testUseFishingRodWithFishSwarm_MiddleBeach_ReceiveFishKeepRodFishSwarmStillInRoom()
      Assert item fish is added to room if fishing rod is in players inventory and nonitem fish swarm exists in current room (middle beach), fish swarm stays in room

    • testFeedShark_FeedWithFishEasternBeach_SharkMovesToIslandWayIsFree

      @Test @DisplayName("FeedShark \u00e2\u2020\u2019 shark moves from eastern beach to island, blocked way gets freed") public void testFeedShark_FeedWithFishEasternBeach_SharkMovesToIslandWayIsFree()
      Assert shark leaves room (eastern beach) after feeding with fish (necessary item) and moves to island, way to island is free, way from island is blocked, fish left inventory

    • testFeedShark_FeedWithFishIsland_SharkMovesToEasternBeachWayIsFree

      @Test @DisplayName("FeedShark \u00e2\u2020\u2019 shark moves from island to eastern beach, blocked way gets freed") public void testFeedShark_FeedWithFishIsland_SharkMovesToEasternBeachWayIsFree()
      Assert shark leaves room (island) after feeding with fish (necessary item) and moves to eastern beach, way to eastern beach is free, way from eastern beach is blocked, fish left inventory

    • testFeedShark_FeedWithMeatEasternBeach_SharkDoesNotMoveToIslandWayRemainsFree

      @Test @DisplayName("FeedShark \u00e2\u2020\u2019 shark dos not move to island, way remains blocked") public void testFeedShark_FeedWithMeatEasternBeach_SharkDoesNotMoveToIslandWayRemainsFree()
      Assert shark does not leave room (eastern beach) after feeding with meat (is not the sharks necessary item) and does not move to island, way to island remains blocked, way from island remains free, meat left inventory

    • testUseMacheteWithThornyBush_WesternBeach_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile

      @Test @DisplayName("UseMacheteWithThornyBush \u00e2\u2020\u2019 way is free, bush + crocodile block jungle/beach connection the other direction") public void testUseMacheteWithThornyBush_WesternBeach_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile()
      Assert the thorny bush gets cut down, this direction of both ways (beach to jungle) is free, thorny bush moves to the other jungle/beach connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with the crocodile

    • testUseMacheteWithThornyBush_JungleGlade_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile

      @Test @DisplayName("UseMacheteWithThornyBush \u00e2\u2020\u2019 way is free, bush + crocodile block beach/jungle connection the other direction") public void testUseMacheteWithThornyBush_JungleGlade_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile()
      Assert the thorny bush gets cut down, this direction of both ways (jungle to beach) is free, thorny bush moves to the other beach/jungle connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with the crocodile

    • testFeedCrocodile_WithMeatPalmForest_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile

      @Test @DisplayName("FeedCrocodile (with meat) \u00e2\u2020\u2019 way is free, bush + crocodile block beach/jungle connection the other direction") public void testFeedCrocodile_WithMeatPalmForest_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile()
      Assert that when crocodile gets fed with meat (its necessary item), this direction of both ways (beach to jungle) is free, it moves to the other jungle/beach connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with thorny bush

    • testFeedCrocodile_WithMeatEasternBeach_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile

      @Test @DisplayName("FeedCrocodile (with meat) \u00e2\u2020\u2019 way is free, bush + crocodile block jungle/beach connection the other direction") public void testFeedCrocodile_WithMeatEasternBeach_WaysAreFreeOtherDirectionBlockedByBushAndCrocodile()
      Assert that when crocodile gets fed with meat (its necessary item), this direction of both ways (jungle to beach) is free, it moves to the other beach/jungle connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with thorny bush

    • testFeedCrocodile_WithFishEasternBeach_WaysRemainBlockedBushAndCrocodileDoNotMove

      @Test @DisplayName("FeedCrocodile (with fish) \u00e2\u2020\u2019 way remains blocked, bush and crocodile do not move") public void testFeedCrocodile_WithFishEasternBeach_WaysRemainBlockedBushAndCrocodileDoNotMove()
      Assert that when crocodile gets fed with fish (not its necessary item), this direction of both ways (beach to jungle) blocked, the other direction remains free, crocodile and thorny bush do not move

    • testUseSpearWithCoconutPalm_PlayerHasSpear_CoconutAddedToRoomEveryThirdTry

      @Test @DisplayName("UseSpearWithCoconutPalm, case: spear in inventory \u00e2\u2020\u2019 coconut is added to room every third try") public void testUseSpearWithCoconutPalm_PlayerHasSpear_CoconutAddedToRoomEveryThirdTry()
      Assert that when item spear is in players inventory and is thrown at the NonItem coconut palm the item coconut will be added to current room only every third try

    • testUseSpearWithCoconutPalm_PlayerHasNoSpear_CoconutNotAddedToRoom

      @Test @DisplayName("UseSpearWithCoconutPalm, case: spear not in inventory \u00e2\u2020\u2019 coconut is not added to room") public void testUseSpearWithCoconutPalm_PlayerHasNoSpear_CoconutNotAddedToRoom()
      Assert that when item spear is not in players inventory it can't be used with NonItem coconut palm, item coconut will not be added to current room

    • testUseRucksack_RucksackInRoom_InventorySizeIncreasedRucksackRemovedFromRoom

      @Test @DisplayName("UseRucksack, case: rucksack is in room \u00e2\u2020\u2019 max inventory size gets increased, rucksack removed from room") public void testUseRucksack_RucksackInRoom_InventorySizeIncreasedRucksackRemovedFromRoom()
      Assert that when rucksack is in current room and gets used, the inventories max size gets increased by the rucksacks strength-attribute and rucksack leaves current room

    • testUseRucksack_RucksackInInventory_InventorySizeIncreasedRucksackRemovedFromInventory

      @Test @DisplayName("UseRucksack, case: rucksack is in inventory \u00e2\u2020\u2019 max inventory size gets increased, rucksack removed from inventory") public void testUseRucksack_RucksackInInventory_InventorySizeIncreasedRucksackRemovedFromInventory()
      Assert that when rucksack is in players inventory and gets used, the inventories max size gets increased by the rucksacks strength-attribute and rucksack gets removed from inventory

    • testUseRucksack_RucksackNotInInventoryOrRoom_InventorySizeNotIncreased

      @Test @DisplayName("UseRucksack, case: rucksack is not in inventory or room \u00e2\u2020\u2019 max inventory size does not get increased") public void testUseRucksack_RucksackNotInInventoryOrRoom_InventorySizeNotIncreased()
      Assert that when player tries to use rucksack when it's not in inventory or current room, the inventories max size does not get increased by the rucksacks strength-attribute

    • testUseNoteWithSuitcase_NoteInInventory_AllContainedItemsGetAddedToRoom

      @Test @DisplayName("UseNoteWithSuitcase, case: note is in inventory \u00e2\u2020\u2019 all contained items get added to room") public void testUseNoteWithSuitcase_NoteInInventory_AllContainedItemsGetAddedToRoom()
      Assert that when item note is in inventory and gets used with nonItem suitcase, the suitcase gets opened and releases all of its items

    • testUseNoteWithSuitcase_NoteNotInInventory_SuitcaseStillClosedNoItemsAddedToRoom

      @Test @DisplayName("UseNoteWithSuitcase, case: note is in not in inventory \u00e2\u2020\u2019 suitcase remains closed, no items added to room") public void testUseNoteWithSuitcase_NoteNotInInventory_SuitcaseStillClosedNoItemsAddedToRoom()
      Assert that when item note is not in inventory and player tries to use it with nonItem suitcase, the suitcase does not get opened and releases no items
